boxes.title: Visit your mining pool to know more.
boxes.text: You get paid out based upon what the pool sets the min payout amount. A pool's min payout amount can vary from pool to pool. You can view the pool's min payout under the "Pool Stats" section. All payouts will go directly from the pool to your wallet.

boxes.title: Learn more about BLOC.MONEY
boxes.text: The world most advanced cryptocurrency ecosystem created without an ICO. Read our whitepaper, check our roadmap and much more on the official website. Discover what the BLOC is all about.

boxes.title: Create your BLOC Dashboard account
boxes.text: Affiliation, Airdrop mission, all the latest informations about BLOC, but also a light wallet with our secure hardware wallet (usb dongle coming soon). Click here.

boxes.title: Join our amazing community.
boxes.text: BLOC.MONEY is nothing without it's amazing and friendly community that you can meet on the official Telegram Chanel and Discord. Join us and let's talk!

boxes.title: Buy and sell BLOC on exchange
boxes.text:
Start trading your BLOC on one of the official exchanges. Right now 2 are available :
  • - Stex
  • - TradeOgre

boxes.title: Follow us not to miss anything
boxes.text: We are updating all our social network regulary, the best way to stay updated about the BLOC. Follow us on Medium, Twitter, Facebook, Youtube and Instagram

boxes.title: Download our smart-phone application
boxes.text: Yes, you can download our iPhone application. Create or import a wallet, send and received BLOC money and many more features. Android version is coming soon.

boxes.title: You need help about the BLOC ?
boxes.text: Join our Telegram chanel or our discord. We and the community will be happy to help you.

boxes.title: Don't forget to sleep mine !
boxes.text: An easy way to mine BLOC with your smartphone and make a passive income while you are sleeping! All the information here.
